message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to own it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. However, I am only able to pay up to $8500 for it.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $9000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I am able to offer $8750 for the product.
I'm still a bit away from your target price, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further and sell the product to you for $8900.
Thank you for considering my needs, Alice. I am willing to offer $8850 for the product.
I'm getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $8800.
